text: Do you like to watch movies (看电影)?我喜欢看电影。因为从电影当中，我会看到很多故事，教会我成长。坐在电影院的时候，我感觉到十分安静，全身心沉浸在电影故事当中。每一次电影，都是导演和演员认真准备的成果，我感谢电影，带给我很多故事。I like to watch movies because  I can see lots of stories that help me develop. Sitting in a movie theatre, I feel completely peaceful. My whole body is immersed in the story.Each movie is a result of the serious efforts by the director and actors. I am thankful to movies for bringing me many stories.1 – 看电影让他感到什么？a. 生气b. 伤心c. 安静d. 不高兴1. cReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
